name: I Love Chantel Jeffries
description:
From the Creators of My Virtual Girlfriend comes the very first Celebrity Dating Game to hit the App store! Featuring the one and only model/actress - Chantel Jeffries

Wanna date Chantel Jeffries? Well, here is your chance! (at least in the virtual sense). I Love Chantel Jeffries, is a fun and flirty dating simulation game that features popular cover model - Chantel Jeffries
All you have to do is keep your dating game tight, and get her to fall head over heels in love with you. Sounds easy right? You got this player!

Your dream date begins...
As with any new relationship, it may start out a bit awkward at first - but it’s all good, she will warm up over time. If you truly got good game, you might just be able to tame this bad girl, claim her heart and win her loyalty.

What can we do together?
Chat it up! Have a conversation. Find our her likes, dislikes and just get to know her. Take her out to dinner, or a movie and dancing. There are dozens of activities you can take her on. Make note of her interests, because the key to winning her heart, is getting to know her personality and what she likes.

You can get her gifts. She loves bikinis. You can also get her stylish clothes or lingerie and other sexy outfits. She will even put them on and wear them, just for you.

She responds to your touch: which can be positive or negative depending on her mood and how well acquainted you two have become.

Every choice you make has either rewards or consequences as you try to find the right things that appeal to her unique personality in order level up- It's just like a real date!

As you make progress- you will gain new levels and for every new level you gain with her- it will open up new ways of interacting, more places to go and things to do, and more outfits become unlocked.


Features:
- Featuring top model and Instagram sensation - Chantel Jeffries!
- Customize her look - adjust her hair, skin, makeup, and even body proportions!
- 30 total levels of progressive game play
- Interact- through conversation, actions, activities and touch
- Artificial AI that mimics her personality.
- HI Resolution 3D Graphics and camera control.
- Achievements and rewards
- Special outfits - bikini's, swimwear, lingerie, cheerleader, and more!
- Have fun by turning her into a zombie, or vampire. Make her a bobble head.


Don’t miss out on this once in a lifetime opportunity to virtually date a celebrity! Download this app today and lets see just how much game you really got!
